column4: How can I place icons for programms on a desktop? I have tried to search for them, and right-click menu doesn't have any send to -> Desktop entry
I think you can simply create a Launcher (right click desktop and find something about that there), or right click a running app in the left panel and "Keep in Launcher".
thank you, I'll try to do it
I hardly ever used Unity though, my memories are fuzzy. I use Xfce myself.
